alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:24AM CST until January 29 at 4:23AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek at Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Agricultural land and low areas along and near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 16.3 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.2 Sun 9 am CST 21.4 19.1 17.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
